title: 1jan2025
content:

Stuck on a leetcode hard problem (two infact)
https://leetcode.com/problems/partition-array-into-two-arrays-to-minimize-sum-difference
need to figure out a memoized/tabulation solution for above. https://leetcode.com/problems/partition-to-k-equal-sum-subsets/description/
no idea about the solution. Spring auth
